job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: pResponsibilitiesppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspIdentify valuable data sources and automate collection processesppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspUndertake preprocessing of structured and unstructured datappnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspAnalyze large amounts of information to discover trends and patternsppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspBuild predictive models and machinelearning algorithmsppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspCombine models through ensemble modelingppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspPresent information using data visualization techniquesppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspPropose solutions and strategies to business challengesppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspCollaborate with engineering and product development teamsppRequirementsppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspProven experience as a Data Scientist ornbspData AnalystppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspExperience in data miningppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspUnderstanding of machinelearning and operations researchppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspKnowledge of R SQL and Python familiarity with Scala Java or C is an assetppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspExperience using business intelligence tools eg Tableau and data frameworks eg HadoopppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspAnalytical mind and business acumenppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspStrong math skills eg statistics algebrappnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspProblemsolving aptitudeppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspExcellent communication and presentation skillsppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspBScBA in Computer Science Engineering or relevant field graduate degree in Data Science or other quantitative field is preferredp
